    • getMaxStudent

      public int getMaxStudent()
      Ask the user to specify the maximum size for the class roster
      Returns:
      classSize to use for comparison

    • getCommand

      public void getCommand()
      Repeatedly get a command from the user if the command is legal, carry out that command using the roster. If the command is illegal, get a new command.
